pr_title: ST: Add k8s version to environment data for upgrade tests

timeline.message:
fixup! Fix timeout

Signed-off-by: Jakub Stejskal <xstejs24@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I think this is confusing ... is this minimum or maximum version? I think it would be better to name this maxK8sVersion.
timeline.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: It's maximum version, going to change it now. Same for rest comments.
replies.author: Frawless

timeline.bodyText: Looks like the Javadoc comment start is there twice.
timeline.author: scholzj

timeline.bodyText: I would probably call the paramater again maxKubernetesVersion or something like that to make it more clear what it does and how it works.
timeline.author: scholzj

timeline.bodyText: Maybe here will be conflict with #3278 -> but I will resolve it in my PR
timeline.author: im-konge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -63,7 +63,7 @@ public static void waitForPodsReady(LabelSelector selector, int expectPods, bool
         int[] counter = {0};
 
         TestUtils.waitFor("All pods matching " + selector + "to be ready",
-            Constants.POLL_INTERVAL_FOR_RESOURCE_READINESS, Duration.ofMinutes(6).toMillis(),
+            Constants.POLL_INTERVAL_FOR_RESOURCE_READINESS, ResourceOperation.rollingUpdateTimeout(expectPods),

replies.bodyText: Ye, if it will be merged sooner, I will resolve conflicts. Looks you have some failures in tests there.
replies.author: Frawless
